# sourcePixelBufferAttributes

**Instance Property**

The pixel buffer attributes of pixel buffers that will be vended by the receiver’s pixel buffer pool.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourcePixelBufferAttributes: CVPixelBufferCreationAttributes? { get }
```

## Accessing the pixel buffer pool

- **pixelBufferPool**: A pixel buffer pool that will vend and efficiently recycle pixel buffer objects that can be appended to the receiver.

items.description: A pixel buffer pool that will vend and efficiently recycle pixel buffer objects that can be appended to the receiver.
